SEARCH
Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.adapter

Class DynamicColorsAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.adapter.DynamicColorsAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Adapter, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter
public class DynamicColorsAdapter extends BaseAdapter
A simple base adapter to hold an array of colors and displays them in an adapter view.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

    IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

  • Constructor Details

    • DynamicColorsAdapter

      public DynamicColorsAdapter(@NonNull Integer[] colors, int colorShape, boolean alpha, @NonNull DynamicColorListener dynamicColorListener)
      Constructor to initialize an object of this class.
      Parameters:
      colors - The array of colors to be handled by this adapter.
      colorShape - The shape of the color swatches.
      alpha - true to enable alpha for the color.
      dynamicColorListener - The listener to get the callback when a color is selected.

    • DynamicColorsAdapter

      public DynamicColorsAdapter(@NonNull Integer[] colors, int colorShape, boolean alpha, @ColorInt int contrastWithColor, @NonNull DynamicColorListener dynamicColorListener)
      Constructor to initialize an object of this class.
      Parameters:
      colors - The array of colors to be handled by this adapter.
      colorShape - The shape of the color swatches.
      alpha - true to enable alpha for the color.
      contrastWithColor - The contrast with color for the swatches.
      dynamicColorListener - The listener to get the callback when a color is selected.

    • DynamicColorsAdapter

      colorShape - The shape of the color swatches.
